title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.

title: Sheila /
author: Swan, Annie S.
snippet: He will be sent to Murthly, and will be very kindly and carefully dealt with there, I assure you.

title: Sheila /
author: Swan, Annie S.
snippet: The trial would be a mere form, for nothing could be proved; and it was probable that, after the examination, he would be removed to the asylum at Murthly.

title: Sheila /
author: Swan, Annie S.
snippet: I fear he'll need to go to Murthly at the end.

title: Sheila /
author: Swan, Annie S.
snippet: The impulse was on Angus M'Bean to speak slightingly of Malcolm, and to say that Murthly was the place for him, but he would not hurt Katie if he could help it, so he held his peace.

title: Sheila /
author: Swan, Annie S.
snippet: ' You'd find yourself in Perth Penitentiary, or maybe in Murthly Asylum, if you tried anything of the kind ; but maybe there are worse places than Murthly for the like of you,' said Angus, with a cruel, sneering smile.

title: Sheila /
author: Swan, Annie S.
snippet: He should be down at Murthly.

title: Lady Jean's Son. A novel
